程序包 org.openjdk.tools.javac.platform

An internal API for plugging in --release implementations.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    PlatformDescription
    A description of settings needed for a particular --release name option.
    PlatformDescription.PluginInfo<T>
    Returns the description of annotation Processor or javac Plugin that should be enabled in the current javac run.
    PlatformProvider
    A collection of platform descriptions that can be selected using --release name command line option.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    JDKPlatformProvider
    PlatformProvider for JDK N.
    PlatformUtils
    Internal utilities to work with PlatformDescriptions.
  • 异常错误概要 
    异常错误 说明
    PlatformProvider.PlatformNotSupported
    Throw if the given platform is not supported.

程序包org.openjdk.tools.javac.platform的说明

An internal API for plugging in --release implementations.

This is NOT part of any supported API. If you write code that depends on this, you do so at your own risk. This code and its internal interfaces are subject to change or deletion without notice.
